text: The M. H. de Young Memorial Museum is an art museum in San Francisco's Golden Gate Park. It is often called just the de Young Museum. It is named for early San Francisco newspaper publisher M. H. de Young. The museum opened in 1895. It was damaged in the 1989 Loma Prieta earthquake. A new museum building opened in 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Art museums in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in San Francisco Category:1895 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in California Category:Museums in California
title: M. H. de Young Memorial Museum
